mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (name, birth_date, school, special_notes, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, parent_contact, student_contact, status, sessions_per_week) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthDate}, #{school}, #{specialNotes}, #{mon}, #{tue}, #{wed}, #{thu}, #{fri}, #{parentContact}, #{studentContact}, #{status}, #{sessionsPerWeek})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, school = #{school}, special_notes = #{specialNotes}, mon = #{mon}, tue = #{tue}, wed = #{wed}, thu = #{thu}, fri = #{fri}, parent_contact = #{parentContact}, student_contact = #{studentContact}, status = #{status}, sessions_per_week = #{sessionsPerWeek}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM students WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY created_at DESC
